product_name: Banana Boat Sport Sunscreen Lip Balm - SPF 50
long_description: Water- and sweat-resistant, the Banana Boat Sport Sunscreen lip balm keeps your lips moisturized and protected from the sun's harmful UVA and UVB rays while you're outside having fun. Lip balm provides SPF 50 protection.
short_description: Water- and sweat-resistant, the Banana Boat Sport Sunscreen lip balm keeps your lips moisturized and protected from the sun's harmful UVA and UVB rays while you're outside having fun.
